text: The following lists events that have happened in 1813 in the Sublime State of Persia. ==Incumbents== * Monarch: Fat′h-Ali Shah Qajar ==Events== * Russo- Persian War (1804–13) finished. * October – Treaty of Gulistan signed between Persia and Russia. ==References== Persia Category:Years of the 19th century in Iran Category:1810s in Iran Persia
title: 1813 in Iran
